title: (x) New Technicolor logo, anyone know the font? / geometric sans - H&FJ Verlag Book {Reed}
content:
Hi everyone!

Technicolor just rebranded...anyone know of the font they used in their new logo?

[http://www.technicolor.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227204031/http:/www.technicolor.com/)

Thanks!!
author: alum

comments.content: Yes! The sheared ‘t’ bar gives is away.
